author: striker
msg: (dav_svn_deliver): Don't add a trailing slash to the visible part

author: striker
msg: Don't add \n to lines that already end in \r\n.  This was mangling
the line endings if the diff was on files with \r\n line endings.
Thanks to Stas Bekman for the suggested fix.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: the response strings from db->resource->pool instead of db->p.  db->p does
not survive by the time we return the request, but db->resource->pool will.

author: blair
msg: (usage): New subroutine.  Print the script's usage and what it does.
Replace custom command line processing code with Getopt::Long.
Do better checking of variable values by using if (defined $var)
instead of if ($var) which fails is $var is a file named `0'.
Explicitly close the `svn log' pipe or the log filename and check
Print the script's name when it wants to die.
